attributes.action: Introduce a new extra driving test before you are allowed  to drive on motorways
attributes.additional_details:
Reading other petitions on this web site has prompted me to consider how selfish and ignorant some drivers are  about correct Motorway driving procedures and safety.

The current system of driving restrictions on Learner drivers  prevents them  getting professional lessons and practice driving on motorways before they  pass  a driving test.

Please make "Pass Plus"   compulsory.  and forbid New drivers  from driving on motorways  until they have passed  a motorway driving test.
